title: Christina Anstead's New Baby, Hudson: See His Birth Certificate!
text:
'Flip or Flop' Star Christina Anstead has a beautiful healthy baby boy Hudson London, and according to his birth certificate he was brought into this world by Orange County's finest.

According to Hudson's birth certificate, obtained by The Blast, the little guy was born at 9:44am on September 6, 2019.

Related:

'Flip or Flop' Star Christina Anstead Chronicles Baby's Journey Leaving Hospital

'Flip or Flop' Star Christina Anstead Shares Sweet Moment Her Kids Met Their Baby Brother!

Christina Anstead Gets Support from 'Housewives' as She preps for C-Section

Christina Anstead Thanks Fans After 'Christina On The Coast' Gets Picked Up for Second Season

Tarek El Moussa Makes It Instagram Official With 'Selling Sunset' Star Heather Young

View photos

As we reported, Christina and husband Ant Anstead had their newborn at Hoag Hospital, in Newport Beach, CA. The hospital in right on the Pacific Ocean, and most maternity suites have ocean views!

View photos

Plus, the certificate says, the doctor who brought Hudson into the world is Brooke Ann Hargrove. Doctor Hargrove works with the Pacific Women's Healthcare Associates in Newport Beach. The group is a premiere group of OBGYN doctors in Southern California.

View photos

The "Flip or Flop" star has been giving her fans an insight to the first few weeks of baby and momma's life, including a recent photo of a breast feeding malfunction.
description: Baby Hudson Was Handled By The Best In The Biz..
